#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#define MOD 10007
using namespace std;
bool p[10000005];
int pri[1000000],nop=0;
void seive()
{
     int n=10000020;
     int i,j,k;
     for(i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
     {
           if(p[i]==0)
           {
                 for(j=i*i;j<=n;j+=i)
                       p[j]=1;
           }
     }
     for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
     {
            if(p[i]==0)
                pri[nop++]=i;
     }
    // cout<<nop;
}
int binary(int n)
{
     int i,j,k,mid;
     int start=0,end=nop-1,ans=-1;
     while(start<end)
     {
                    
           mid=(start+end)/2;
//            cout<<start<<" "<<mid<<" "<<end<<endl;
           if(pri[mid]==n)
           {
               ans=mid;
               break;
           }
           else if(pri[mid]<n)
           {
                ans=mid;
                start=mid+1;
           }
           else if(pri[mid]>n)
           {
                end=mid;
           }
     }
     return ans+1;
}
long long pow(int n)
{
     long long ans=1,temp=2;
     while(n)
     {
             if(n%2==1)
             {
                  ans=(ans*temp)%MOD;
             }
             temp=(temp*temp)%MOD;
             n/=2;
     }
     return ans;
}
             
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,l,n;
    seive();
    for(i=0;i<10;i++)
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=EOF)
    {
          int a=binary(n);
          if(a==0)
          {
                  printf("0\n");
                  continue;
          }
          printf("%lld\n",pow(a-1));
    }
}
